      • updateConfigureButtonState

        public void updateConfigureButtonState(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)
        Uses the information of the given installed bbj plugin to enable or disable the "Run Configuration Program" button. If the gievn installed plugin has a configuration program located in its home/cfg/ folder the button will be enabled, otherwise it will be disabled.
        Parameters:
        installedPlugin! - The installed plugin used to determine the state of the button.
